LI.P: The Harlot is CANNIBALIZED by the BEAST.
LI.Q: One of the seven angels who had the seven bowls came and said to me, "Come, I will show you the punishment of the great prostitute, who sits by many waters."
LI.P: Response: Talk to people about God and talk to God about people.
The Beast is ANNIHILATED in BATTLE.
LI.Q: After this I heard what sounded like the roar of a great multitude in heaven shouting: "Hallelujah! Salvation and glory and power belong to our God."

LI.P: The Dragon is CAST into HELL.
LI.Q: And I saw an angel coming down out of heaven, having the key to the Abyss and holding in his hand a great chain.

Note.Q: Then I saw "a new heaven and a new earth," for the first heaven and the first earth had passed away, and there was no longer any sea.
Note.P: TAKE AWAY: HANG on to HOPE.
